Package ch.colabproject.colab.api.rest.document

Class ResourceRestEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.colabproject.colab.api.rest.document.ResourceRestEndpoint
  • @Path("resources")
@Consumes("application/json")
@Produces("application/json")
public class ResourceRestEndpoint
extends Object
    REST resource controller

        @GET
@Path("{id}")
public AbstractResource getAbstractResource​(@PathParam("id")
                                            Long id)
        Get the resource or resource reference identified by the given id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the resource or resource reference to fetch
        Returns:
        the resource or resource reference or null

      • getResourceChainForAbstractCardType

        @GET
@Path("fromCardType/{cardTypeOrRefId}")
public List<List<AbstractResource>> getResourceChainForAbstractCardType​(@PathParam("cardTypeOrRefId")
                                                                        Long cardTypeOrRefId)
        Get the resources linked to the card type or reference. With a list of resource references to retrieve each resource.
        Parameters:
        cardTypeOrRefId - the id of the abstract card type for which we look for the linked resources
        Returns:
        The targeted resource and a list of the references to get it

      • getResourceChainForCard

        @GET
@Path("fromCard/{cardId}")
public List<List<AbstractResource>> getResourceChainForCard​(@PathParam("cardId")
                                                            Long cardId)
        Get the resources linked to the card. With a list of resource references to retrieve each resource.
        Parameters:
        cardId - the id of the card for which we look for the linked resources
        Returns:
        The targeted resource and a list of the references to get it

@Path("fromCardContent/{cardContentId}")
public List<List<AbstractResource>> getResourceChainForCardContent​(@PathParam("cardContentId")
                                                                   Long cardContentId)
        Get the resources linked to the card content. With a list of resource references to retrieve each resource.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        @GET
@Path("directOfProject/{projectId}")
public List<AbstractResource> getDirectAbstractResourcesOfProject​(@PathParam("projectId")
                                                                  Long projectId)
        Get the resources directly linked to the given project.

        Does not fetch all chain references.

        Parameters:
        projectId - the id of the project ‡
        Returns:
        resources directly linked to the given project

        @GET
@Path("externalReference/{abstractResourceId}")
public List<ResourceExternalReference> getResourceExternalReferences​(@PathParam("abstractResourceId")
                                                                     Long abstractResourceId)
        Get the list of project which reference the given resource, excluding the project which owns the resource.
        Parameters:
        abstractResourceId - if of the targeted resource
        Returns:
        list of externalReference

      • updateResource

        @PUT
public void updateResource​(Resource resource)
                    throws ColabMergeException
        Save changes to database. Only fields which are editable by users will be impacted.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to update
        Throws:
        ColabMergeException - if the merge is impossible

@Path("ref")
public void updateResourceRef​(ResourceRef resourceRef)
                       throws ColabMergeException
        Save changes to database. Only fields which are editable by users will be impacted.
        Parameters:
        resourceRef - the resource reference to update
        Throws:
        ColabMergeException - if the merge is impossible

      • damr1

        @PUT
@Path("copyResource1/{resourceId}/to/{parentType: (Card|CardContent|CardType)}/{parentId}")
public Long damr1​(@PathParam("resourceId")
                  Long resourceId,
                  @PathParam("parentType")
                  String parentType,
                  @PathParam("parentId")
                  Long parentId)
        Duplicate the given resource
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the id of the resource we want to duplicate
        parentType - the new owner
        parentId - if of the new owner
        Returns:
        the id of the duplicated resource

@Path("discard")
public void discardResourceOrRef​(Long resourceOrRefId)

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • moveResource

        @PUT
@Path("move/{resourceId}/to/{parentType: (Card|CardContent|CardType)}/{parentId}/{published}")
public void moveResource​(@PathParam("resourceId")
                         Long resourceId,
                         @PathParam("parentType")
                         String parentType,
                         @PathParam("parentId")
                         Long parentId,
                         @PathParam("published")
                         Boolean published)
        Move a resource to a new resourceable.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - id of the resource to move
        parentType - the new owner
        parentId - if of the new owner
        published - new publication status

@Path("{id}/addDocumentAtBeginning")

                                       Long resourceId,
                                       Document document)
        Add the document at the beginning of the resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the id of the resource
        document - the document to use in the resource. It must be a new document
        Returns:
        the document newly created

      • addDocumentBefore

        @POST
@Path("{id}/addDocumentBefore/{neighbourDocId}")
public Document addDocumentBefore​(@PathParam("id")
                                  Long resourceId,
                                  @PathParam("neighbourDocId")
                                  Long neighbourDocId,
                                  Document document)
        Add the document to the resource just before the given document.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the id of the resource
        neighbourDocId - the id of the document which will be just after the new document
        document - the document to use in the resource. It must be a new document
        Returns:
        the document newly created
